channel.title: CNN on Xinlin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CNN on Xinlin's Blog

item.title: Convolutional Neuron Networks (CNN)
item.description: Convolutional neuron networks (CNN) have been revolutionized image-related Artificial Intellegence (AI) tasks. This kind of neuron network architectures have been obtained huge success. Furthermore, CNNs are very interesting. They have many design elements and variants you could play with. Academic researches might pursue a beauty of purity and emphasize the unique feature they proposed. However, in industry application, it’s not necessary to build a network pure. It’s highly possible to combine all necessary design elements together. However, we should have a deep understand of all these design elements.
